author: cmpilato
msg: For issue #3425 (Links generated by ?r=/p= public URL schema aren't
revision-sticky), make the ".." updir links carry ?p=REV when
necessary, too.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/repos.c
(deliver): Add "p=REV" CGI query bits to the updir links, too, when
viewed a pegged revision.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39023, fix two node kind tests.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c
(restore_node): Compare to the right node enum value.
(report_revisions_and_depths): Check the right variable.

author: julianfoad
msg: * notes/obliterate/comparison.txt
Add a bit more p4 detail; mention Hg and Git.

author: hwright
msg: In updating type information in r39026, I mistakenly used an unsigned type
which we depended on rolling over to a negative value.  Rather than attempt
to put an unsigned value into a signed variable and add casts everywhere, just
use pointers (since that really what we're trying to emulate here), and
be done with it.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/opt.c
(svn_opt__split_arg_at_peg_revision): Instead of using an index, use
pointer comparisons.

author: julianfoad
msg: * notes/obliterate/comparison.txt: New file, outlining how Obliterate works in
other VCSs.
